entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
